name: Play Football Xmas. A real soccer sports games for holiday christmas season 2014
name_original: Play Football Xmas. A real soccer sports games for holiday christmas season 2014
description:
***Game Contains High Resolution graphics and effects, If you have iPhone 4 or iPad 1 you may experience some glitches or jerky animations***

Happy Holidays 2014 - Year is ending and we brought you this super new xmas 3d soccer game. Download and enjoy realistic football gameplay, with awesome music and graphics.

Its a type of indoor football game with 5 players in each team. Competition is high, take control of your team and qualify in finals.

Game Features
- 5 responsive game controls to get control of your player in gameplay
-Quick Match Game Mode sets the match with a random team.
-Tournament Game Mode Play tournament, win matches and qualify to final
-Share your score with friends on Facebook
-Shout on social media when you manage to beat your opponent team in match
-Invite friends to play game
-Make your place in global leader board and compete players from all over the world
-Elegant winter theme and snowy season
-View Replays of all goals
-Adjust match timings with your comfort
-Get incentive stars on winning a game.
-3 Stars will be rewarded if you manage to beat opponent from more then 3 goals
-2 Stars will be rewarded if you beat opponent from 2 goals
-1 Star will be rewarded if you beat opponent from 1 goal
-Realistic sounds and stunning graphics


=======
Feedback
=======
If you have any suggested features or improvements please leave a comment, or send us an email at ask.airbornestudio@gmail.com. In case something is not working correctly please let us know, I'll be glad to fix that.
Please post comments and feedback. When posting low rating please describe what is wrong to give the possibility to fix that issue.
